backend/main.mo: Actor that mixes in blob storage functionality via MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing deployment of updated Valentine prompt and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, styles, and publishing docs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup with extensive OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for the Valentine UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with no‑cache headers and script loader for the Vite React app.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Deployment checklist detailing build steps, production deployment, and verification procedures including cache‑busting checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive Valentine prompt UI with growing Yes button, No‑click hints, background, floating hearts, and success-screen transition.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates randomized floating heart elements for animated background decoration.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMessage.t: Displays the animated celebratory screen with confetti hearts and success text after the user selects Yes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React authentication context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus extensive CSS variables for themes including Valentine palettes and dark mode, along with custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors sourced from CSS vars, custom radii, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature states, and requirements related to updating Valentine-themed text and personalized names.
